issue.description: The name of the attributes "allowed_values" should be "allowed_value" and the name of the attribute "classified_entities" should be classified_entity.

It is not specified what happens to the inherited mandatory attributes of entities in the mim. For example what value(s) are allowable for the attribute_classification_assignment.role attribute that is inherited by the applied_attribute_classification_assignment entity? The role attribute in this case might be considered ambiguous to some. The guidelines recommend values for these attributes may be documented in the "Module implementation and usage guide" annex of the application module - but none was found. I suggest that this is added with a list of the entities/attributes concerned and marked for further assessment when a usage guide is developed (else these will be lost until implementers begin their work causing confusion later on).
